tool.name: ms-vfetc
tool.description: Convert MS vendor export format to generic tabular file.
tool.help: Converts MS vendor export formats to a generic format for data analysis. Supported vendors are Agilent, Sciex, Shimadzu and Waters. Please note! this does not convert the raw formats, only the exported text formats. More information and examples can be found at: https://github.com/phnmnl/container-ms-vfetc.
